#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define print(a) cout<<a
#define T ll t; cin>>t ; while(t--)
#define fin freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)

int main() {
    T {
        ll n;
        cin>>n;

        ll a[n+1];

        for(ll i=0;i<n;i++) {
            cin>>a[i];
        }

        sort(a,a+n);

        ll first=0,second=0;

        for(ll i=n-1;i>=0;i--) {
            if(first <= second ) {
                first+=a[i];
            }
            else {
                second+=a[i];
            }
        }

        cout<<abs(first-second)<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
